message.content: {"given_definition_quality":75,"better_definition":"outside; not inside a place","sentence":"他们在外边。","image_prompt":"A group of people are standing together outside a building, with the city or sky visible in the background. The scene is in the soft apocalypse animation style: gentle, muted colors, dreamy lighting, and slight surreal atmosphere. The sense of being outside should be strongly felt, with the contrast between the inside of the building and the outer world.","sentence_translation":"They are outside."}
